TopicTitle: Rockets from when I played the Demo

Articles.Content:
Not entirely sure where to put this, but here seems appropriate.

I first downloaded the KSP demo about a year and a half ago. I think I played it for about two months before I finally got the full game.

Not that 1.0 is out, I thought it would be a good time to go back and see some of things that I'd built when I was first learning KSP.

Man, did I build some monstrosities back then...

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/1ww0I/embed?background=292929&text=ffffff&link=4e76c9)
